/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the man-made structures below. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches reaching towards the sky, suggesting that the photo was taken during the winter or early spring when trees typically lose their leaves.
